response.overview: On the interstellar refugee planet of Neutropia—a portal world that connects the Solar System to another constellation of stars in our galaxy called the "System of Elements," where creatures and monsters roam—an inauguration is underway as the people controversially welcome their youngest soon-to-be queen, Zyriah—a once-orphaned peasant whose rise to power is met with fierce opposition. Many oppose her rule and are willing to go to unimaginable lengths to prevent the ascension ceremony, making her journey a dark and treacherous fight to establish herself as the leader of this magical world.
response.title: Neutropia
